name: Punch Bean: LoGC
description:
A platforming brawler where you explore an open-ended level and collect Golden Coins! Can you collect all of the gold coins? Supports both Gamepad & Keyboard and Mouse controls! (Gamepad Preferred)

Supports Gamepad and Keyboard & Mouse.

Controls: 

InputKeyboard & MouseGamepad ( Xbox )MoveWASDLeft Stick
JumpSpaceAPunchLeft Mouse ClickXUppercut/SlamRight Mouse ClickYDodge RollFBMove CameraMouse MovementRight StickTarget LockTabPress Right StickPauseEscStart (Menu)
